page.title: 14NEWSPAPER EDITOR FOR L/H
page.content: { Bill Allen}is the{editor of the {Worsley Journal}which covers a geographic area that includes Little Hulton,Walkden, Boothstown, Row Green and Worsley. The{Journal aims}to record the events and activities { {of interest to local people.}The paper campaigns on behalf of the people by attending public meetings, asking pertinent questions and printing readers letters.{Issues of the day}e.g unemployment, council housing, open cast mining etc receive comprehensive coverage over a long period. {Adverts}are the most important source of revenue despite the paper costing 18p to buy. If only 10 pages of adverts are sold then the newspaper will only be 20 pages long.T.V. and radio news have not affected the success of this newspaper as much as the advent of 'free' publications.
